items.content_html: A lightweight REST API based on the Medium website, with rating calculations for posts and users. It also includes a feature to estimate reading time for posts. Authorization is done using JWT (access and refresh tokens). The database is built on SQLite.

items.content_html: webfunny是一款轻量级的前端性能监控系统，也是一款埋点系统，私有化部署，简单易用。Webfunny is a lightweight front-end performance monitoring system and a burying point system, which is privatized and easy to use.
